name: Roll Tomato! Roll!
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam!

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-172

You're about to become a cooked tomato! Quickly escape out the window before the cook's hand grabs you! (And be careful not to fall into one of their pots!).

Roll tomato! Roll!

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump
